metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8624 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In BIND 9.9.12 -> 9.9.13, 9.10.7 -> 9.10.8, 9.11.3 -> 9.11.21, 9.12.1 ->9.16.5, 9.17.0 -> 9.17.3, also affects 9.9.12-S1 -> 9.9.13-S1, 9.11.3-S1 ->9.11.21-S1 of the BIND 9 Supported Preview Edition, An attacker who hasbeen granted privileges to change a specific subset of the zone's contentcould abuse these unintended additional privileges to update other contentsof the zone.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
